item.title: PINS
item.description: score:171 Chances: Pinterest (PINS) closed at $38.04 in the latest trading session, marking a +0.9% move from the prior day. Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest bought 172,894 shares of Pinterest, a move that, based on the stock’s closing price of $37.70, was valued at roughly $6.
